response.overview: Defense of Debaltseve. The brutal battle that unfolded in early 2015 and was completed on February 18-19, when the Ukrainian troops leaved bridgehead wich had surrounded. The truth about one of the bloodiest and controversial episodes of the war in Ukraine. Incredible stories of feats, facts of heroism and betrayal. Little-known details and evidence of participants in the events. The dark and terrible truth, true story about modern heroes.
response.title: Дебальцеве
